page.title: 02A DAY AT CRANWELL SCHOOL
page.content: Every morning I cycle to school with my friend Kristel. We arrive at 8.50, and go inside when the bell rings. We have assembly in the school hall. Sometimes we have a story, or a padre comes in. After assembly we have P.E. for half an hour, we then have a mental arithmetic test, then it is playtime. During playtime we often play elastics, there is a song we sing "England Ireland Scotland Wales inside outside inside on." After playtime we do maths and English until dinner. When it is dinner we have another playtime, and we play tig. We have dinner at 12.30pm, after dinner we do clay till 2.45pm. Finally we have a story, our present one is, "Danny the Champion of the World", we then put our chairs up. Kristel and I get our coats, walk to our bikes, and ride home.
